tvām iyam anavasthaḥ niṣkaruṇaḥ ca iti ratnavatī nimittam atyartham nindati
tat eṣa kandukaḥ vipakṣa dhanam pratyarpaṇīyam iti

original: sa tathokto niyatamunmukhībhūya tāmeva priyasakhīṃ manyamāno māṃ baddhāñjali yācamānāyai mahyaṃ bhūyastvatprārthitaḥ sābhilāṣamarpayiṣyati
analyzed: sa tathā uktaḥ niyatam unmukhībhūya tām eva priya sakhīm manyamānaḥ mām baddhāñjali yācamānāyai mahyam bhūyas tvad prārthitaḥ sa abhilāṣam arpayiṣyati

original: “tena randhreṇopaśliṣya rāgamujjvalīkṛtya yathāsā kṛtasaṅketo deśāntaramādāya māṃ gamiṣyati tathopapādanīyam' iti /
analyzed: tena randhreṇa upaśliṣya rāgam ujjvalīkṛtya yathā asā kṛta saṅketaḥ deśa antaram ādāya mām gamiṣyati tathā upapādanīyam iti
harṣa abhyutepayā ca anayā tathā eva saṃpāditam

original: athaitāṃ kanakavatīti vṛddhatāpasīvipralabdho balabhadraḥ saratnasārābharaṇāmādāya niśi nīrandhre tamasi prāvasat /
analyzed: atha etām kanakavatī iti vṛddha tāpasī vipralabdhaḥ balabhadraḥ sa ratna sāra ābharaṇām ādāya niśi nīrandhre tamasi prāvasat

original: sā tu tāpasī vārtāmāpādayat-“mandena mayā nirnimittamupekṣitā ratnavatī,
analyzed: sā tu tāpasī vārtām āpādayat mandena mayā nirnimittam upekṣitā ratnavatī
śvaśurau ca paribhūtau
suhṛdaḥ ca ativartitāḥ

original: tadatraiva saṃsṛṣṭo jivituṃ jihnemīti balabhadraḥ pūrvedyurmāmakathayat /
analyzed: tat atra eva saṃsṛṣṭaḥ jivitum jihnemi iti balabhadraḥ pūrvedyus mām akathayat
nūnam asau tena nītā vyaktiḥ ca acirāt bhaviṣyati iti
tat śrutvā tad bāndhavāḥ tad anveṣaṇām prati śithila yatnāḥ tasthuḥ

original: ratnavatī tu mārge kāñcitpaṇyadāsīṃ saṃgṛhya tayohyamānapātheyādyupaskarā khaṭakapuramagamat /
analyzed: ratnavatī tu mārge kāñcid paṇya dāsīm saṃgṛhya tayā uhyamāna pātheya ādi upaskarā khaṭakapuram agamat

original: amutra ca vyavahārakuśalo balabhadraḥ svalpenaiva mūlena mahadvanamupārjayat /
analyzed: amutra ca vyavahāra kuśalaḥ balabhadraḥ su alpena eva mūlena mahat vanam upārjayat
paura agragaṇyaḥ ca āsīt
parijanaḥ ca bhūyān artha vaśāt samājagāma
tatas tām prathama dāsīm na karma karoṣi
dṛṣṭam muṣṇāsi
apriyam bravīṣi iti paruṣam uktvā bahu atāḍayat
ceṭī tu prasāda kāla upākhyāta rahasyasya vṛttānta eka deśam ātta roṣā nirbibheda

original: tacchutvā lubdhena tu daṇḍavāhinā pauravṛddhasaṃnidhau nidhipatidattasya kanyāṃ kanakavatīṃ moṣeṇāpahṛtyāsmatpure nivasatyeṣa durmatirbalabhadraḥ
analyzed: tat śutvā lubdhena tu daṇḍavāhinā paura vṛddha saṃnidhau nidhipatidattasya kanyām kanakavatīm moṣeṇa apahṛtya asmad pure nivasati eṣa durmatiḥ balabhadraḥ

original: tasya sarvasvaharaṇaṃ na bhavadbhiḥ pratibandhanīyam' iti nitarāmabhartsyata /
analyzed: tasya sarva sva haraṇam na bhavadbhiḥ pratibandhanīyam iti nitarām abhartsyata
bhītam ca balabhadram abhijagāda ratnavatī na bhetavyam
brūhi nā iyam nidhipati datta kanyā kanakavatī

original: balabhyāmeva gṛhagupataduhitā ratnavatī nāmeyaṃ dattā pitṛbhyāṃ mayā ca nyāyoḍhā /
analyzed: balabhyām eva gṛhagupata duhitā ratnavatī nāma iyam dattā pitṛbhyām mayā ca nyāya ūḍhā

original: balabhadrastu tathoktvā śreṇīprātibhāvyena tāvadavātiṣṭhata yāvattatpuravṛddhalekhyalabdhavṛttānto gṛhaguptaḥ kheṭakapuramāgatya saha jāmātrā  #
analyzed: balabhadraḥ tu tathā uktvā śreṇī prātibhāvyena tāvat avātiṣṭhata yāvat tad pura vṛddha lekhya labdha vṛttāntaḥ gṛha guptaḥ kheṭaka puram āgatya saha jāmātrā
duhitaram ati prītaḥ pratyanaiṣīt

original: tathā dṛṣṭvā ratnavatīṃ kanakavatīti bhāvayatastasyaiva balabhadrasyātivallabhā jātā /

original: tatra kaścitkulaputraḥ kalāsu gaṇikāsu cātiraktaḥ mitrārthaṃ svabhujamātranirvyūḍhānekakalahaḥ,

original: sa caikadā kasyacidāgantościtrakarasya haste citrapaṭaṃ dadarśa /

original: tadiyaṃ vṛddhasya kasyacidvaṇijo nātipuṃstvasya yathārhasaṃbhogālābhapīḍitā gṛhiṇī tvayātikauśalādyathādṛṣṭamālikhitā bhavitumarhati' iti /

original: avantipuryāmujjayinyāmanantakīrtināmnaḥ sārthavāhasya bhāryā yathārthanāmā nitambavatī nāmaiṣā saundaryavismitena mayaivamālikhitā' iti /

original: bhārgavo nāma bhūtvā bhikṣānibhena tadgṛhaṃ praviśya tāṃ dadarśa /

dṛṣṭvā ca ati ārūḍha manmathaḥ nirgatya śmaśāna rakṣām ayācata

analyzed: sa ca anuyuktaḥ dhūrtaḥ sa vinayam āvedayatu iditam eva khalu vaḥ

original: sa tu matsaṃbandhī brahmārākṣasaḥ “tiṣṭha tiṣṭha pāpa,

original: upagṛhya ca veṣamānāṃ saṃmīlitākṣīṃ madaṅgasparśasukhonodbhinnaromāñcāṃ tādṛśīmeva tāmanavatarayannatiṣṭham /

original: punarahamatimṛduni pulinavati kusumalavalāñchite sarastīre 'varopya saspṛhaṃ nirvarṇayaṃstāṃ matprāṇaikavallabhāṃ rājakanyāṃ kandukāvatīmalakṣayam

original: sā hi mayā samāśvāsyamānā tiryaṅmāmabhinirūpya jātapratyabhijñā sakarumarodīt /

original: tvaṃ kila samudramadhye majjitaḥ pāpena madbhātrā bhīmadhanvanā' iti śrutvā sakhījanaṃ parijanaṃ ca vañcayitvā jīvitaṃ jihāsurekākinī krīḍāvanamupāgamam
analyzed: tvam kila samudra madhye majjitaḥ pāpena mad bhātrā bhīma dhanvanā iti śrutvā sakhī janam parijanam ca vañcayitvā jīvitam jihāsuḥ ekākinī krīḍā vanam upāgamam

original: tatra ca māmacakamata kāmarūpa eṣa rākṣasādhama /

original: tatpratigatyaṃ kuśalamasya madvārtā ca devyai raho nivedya punaḥ kumāraḥ śārdūlabhakṣita iti prakāśamākrośanaṃ kāryam /

original: punastayā tvanmukhena sa vācyaḥ-“yadapekṣayā tvanmatamatyakramiṣaṃ so 'pi bālaḥ pāpena me paralokamagāt /
analyzed: punar tayā tvad mukhena sa vācyaḥ yad apekṣayā tvad matam atyakramiṣam saḥ pi bālaḥ pāpena me para lokam agāt
adya tu tvad ādeśa kāriṇī eva aham iti
sa tayā uktaḥ prītim pratipadya abhipatsyati

original: punaranena vatsanābhanāmnā mahāviṣeṇa saṃnīya toyaṃ tatra mālāṃ majjayitvā tayā sa vakṣasi mukhe ca hantavyaḥ /
analyzed: punar anena vatsanābha nāmnā mahāviṣeṇa saṃnīya toyam tatra mālām majjayitvā tayā sa vakṣasi mukhe ca hantavyaḥ

original: punaranenāgadena saṃgamite 'mbhasi tāṃ mālāṃ majjayitvā svaduhitre deyā /

original: mṛte tu tasmiṃstasyāṃ ca nirvikārāyāṃ satyām,

original: tāvadāvāṃ kāpālikavepacchannau devyaiva dīyamānabhikṣau puro vahirupaśmaśānaṃ vatsyāvaḥ /

original: yatastadeva dattaṃ dāma duhitre stanamaṇḍanameva tasyai jātaṃ na mṛtyuḥ /
analyzed: yatas tat eva dattam dāma duhitre stana maṇḍanam eva tasyai jātam na mṛtyuḥ
